title: Ballpark Time
custom_preconds:
When there are dynamic attribute values available in Non Game Event (NGE) data.

http://qa.ticketing-client.com/ticketing-client/json/EventTicketPromotion.tiksrv?display_in=ATBAT&site_section=Default&ticket_category=Tickets&leave_empty_games=true&game_status=S&game_status=P&game_status=I&game_status=M&game_status=N&game_status=T&game_status=U&ensureArray=non_game,game&team_id=158&team_xref_id=158&begin_date=20171013&end_date=20181013&events=5&offer_group=BALLPARKTAB
custom_expected:
The values will override any database values, and will be displayed in the app

Ballpark Tab - Upcoming Events
Ballpark Tab - Native Schedule
Ballpark Tab - Event Detail

custom_steps_separated.content:
String.

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains a string.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The database time will be overridden
AND the string will be displayed as the time value.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Database (db)

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains ("db")
custom_steps_separated.expected: The app will display the database time value .

custom_steps_separated.content:
To Be Determined (TBD) 

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains (TBD) (case sensitive)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The Database time value will be overridden
AND the app will display "Time TBD" in the time field.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Blank

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains ("blank")
(case sensitive)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The database time value will be overridden
AND the event time field will not be displayed.

title: Ballpark Date

custom_expected:

Ballpark Tab - Upcoming Events
Ballpark Tab - Native Schedule

custom_steps_separated.content:
String.

When the BALLPARK_DATE value contains a string.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The database time will be overridden

custom_steps_separated.content:

To Be Determined (TBD)

When the BALLPARK_DATE value contains (TBD) (case sensitive)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The Database time value will be overridden
AND the app will display "Time TBD" in the time field.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Blank

When the BALLPARK_DATE value contains ("blank")
(case sensitive)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The database date value will be overridden
AND the event time field will not be displayed.

title: Ballpark Venue

custom_expected:
The values will override any database values, and will be displayed in the app

Ballpark Tab - Upcoming Events

custom_steps_separated.content:
String.

When the BALLPARK_VENUE value contains a string.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The database VENUE will be overridden
AND the string will be displayed as the venue value.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Database (db)

When the BALLPARK_VENUE value contains ("db")
custom_steps_separated.expected: The app will display the database venue value.

custom_steps_separated.content:
To Be Determined (TBD)

When the BALLPARK_VENUE value contains (TBD) (case sensitive)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The Database VENUE value will be overridden
AND the app will display " TBD" in the venue field.

title: Database Time
custom_expected:
The Database value behavior will be observed in the app.

Ballpark Tab - Upcoming Events
Ballpark Tab - Native Schedule
Ballpark Tab - Event Detail

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the local event time is set to 3:33 AM ET in the event data

"event_time_local": "2017-10-29T03:33:00"
custom_steps_separated.expected: The app will display "TBD"

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the local event time is set to any time that is not 03:33 AM ET

"event_time_local": "2017-10-29T19:30:00"
custom_steps_separated.expected: The local time will be displayed correctly in the app.

title: Ballpark Time
custom_preconds:
When there are dynamic attribute values available in Non Game Event (NGE) data.
AND "dateTBD": false,

https://qa.boxoffice.mlb.com/api/v1/users/ticketDashboard?guid=0a4d1896cff51ec678bb2fa5a614c507&teamID=158&asOfDate=2017-10-13&refresh=true
custom_expected:
The values will override any database values, and will be displayed in the app

Tickets Tab - Next Event (top of screen)
Tickets Tab - Next Home Events, All Home Events
Tickets Tab - Upcoming Events (only shows if user has tickets)

custom_steps_separated.content:
String.

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains a string.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The database time will be overridden
AND the string will be displayed as the time value.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Database (db)

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains ("db")
custom_steps_separated.expected: The app will display the database time value .

custom_steps_separated.content:
To Be Determined (TBD)

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains (TBD) (case sensitive)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The Database time value will be overridden
AND the app will display "Time TBD" in the time field.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Blank

When the BALLPARK_TIME value contains ("blank")
(case sensitive)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The database time value will be overridden
AND the event time field will not be displayed.
